sources.name: The Conference Board Total Economy Database (2016) Labour Productivity
sources.description:
Description:
Data published by

The Conference Board Total Economy Database (2016)

Data publisher's source

In detail described by the publisher at https://www.conference-board.org/data/economydatabase/

Linkhttps://www.conference-board.org/data/economydatabase/
RetrievedMay 27, 2016

Additional information


Shown is the data series "LP-Hour EKS" from the original source. As the alternative series "LP-Hour GK" this series is series is expressed in PPP adjusted currency. The PPP adjustment is based on the 2011 PPPs and updated to 2015 prices.

variables.name: Select your dataset
variables.description: Labor productivity per hour worked in 2015 US$ (converted to 2015 price level with updated 2011 PPPs)
